data.title: Strathclyde Partnership for Transport
data.meta_description: Park and Ride helps reduce traffic congestion and encourages people to use public transport. Use our map, designed to help you find your nearest park and ride facility.
data.text:
Parking is available at Bridge Street, Kelvinbridge and Shields Road Subway stations. Car parking is available during Subway opening hours only with no overnight parking permitted.

For Park and Ride tickets, including using a Smartcard for Subway travel, please take a ticket at the car park entry barrier and present this at the Subway ticket office when paying. The ticket will be linked to your number plate, and once you have paid you will automatically be allowed exit from the car park.

For parking only (no Subway travel) you can simply pay with a debit/credit card at the car park exit.
